working with Oracle 12c 11g and 10g versions Areas of work include production support installation and configuration migration backup and recovery performance tuning cloning security upgrades and tablespace growth and database growth Highly experienced in hotcold backup and recovery and cloning of databases using RMAN Experienced in performance monitoringtuningtroubleshooting Oracle database jobs timeCPU consuming queries Light knowledge on mongo db and mysql Equipped with excellent communication and interpersonal skills a highly organized individual and team player who possesses strong to secure the connections Database Services creation for distributing the applications across multiple nodes Extensively used all command line utilities SRVCTL CRSCTL ADR ASMCMD Redefinition of tables
